Address: 2689 Ann Arbor-Saline Rd, Ann Arbor, MI 48103

summary.snippet: "Amazing service and food, very nice staff and quick service."
"Delicious home-cooked tasting burgers - juicy and flavorful!"
"My kids complained the meat tasted like "weird crushed hot dog.""

most_relevant.description: My boyfriend and I were looking for a good burger place in Ann Arbor and stumbled upon Taystee’s Burgers in our search. We were pleasantly surprised by the extensive menu and plethora of options. We dined in on a Sunday and I would have definitely gotten a chicken wrap if they weren’t only available on Tuesdays. I got the BBQ burger on a gluten free bun and my boyfriend did a Build Your Own grilled chicken sandwich and loaded it up with his favorite toppings. We also shared a Cajun curly fry, and besides the fact that there was a heavy amount of seasoning on them we still enjoyed our side. We were in Ann Arbor for my birthday and live in Metro Detroit. We will definitely be visiting one of the other locations closer to home.

AJ, and the boys killed it tonight!  My family and I are on a burger tour and I felt that a Taystee’s Burger should be on the list.  We purchased 7 different burgers and cut them up to share.  Now they loose their presentation that way but we all get a couple good size bites of each burger.  I liked both the Mushroom Swiss and the Taystees Volcano Burger.  My wife enjoyed the Mac-Attack, the Boys liked the Taystees Volcano Burger, Nacho Burger and Breakfast Burger.  My Daughter voted for the Breakfast Burger.   Great Food! Great Service, Great Price.  Taystee Burger is only $9.50, the Breakfast Burger is $16 but it is huge.   I love this place and have been to multiple locations and now my wife and kids love it too.   Great job AJ.  Taystees made the list.

Stopped by from out of state looking for a good burger. The guy at the register took the time to give us a rundown of the entire menu which I thought was really awesome of him. He was educated on the entire menu and it made it super easy for my fiancée and I to choose what we wanted. We both typically have basic tastes but the entire menu looked delicious. Got a single burger with just cheese and it’s  the best burger I’ve ever had in my life. I’m currently writing this review while eating it because I didn’t want to forget to give these guys the credit they deserve. Top notch service and top notch food. You can’t go wrong here.

It was one of the best burger experiences I have had! The restaurant smells amazing, and the burger didn't disappoint... BBQ burger was great! Cajun fries are also really good. So many options... I can't wait to return! Keep up the good work!!!
They won best burger in Michigan. Very good burger but generally sloppy and wet. Definitely recommend.

The burgers were absolutely delicious and the staff was incredibly friendly and helpful! I will definitely be coming back soon
Note: the food is also completely halal if that is important to you!

Kitsch diner meets industrial style and the food is drool worthy.   First time in here.  Ordered the original burger and onion rings at1:30 am.  Made to order and perfectly prepared.   Kudos!  Please stay true to your standards and will continue to sing your praises.   Thanks for a pleasant surprise!  Will be back and will highly recommend.

Ive seen this place a few times passing by but never went in. Today i did and it was great. The service was kind, the food was amazing, and the atmosphere was cool. The staff were serving me with a smile and the restaurant has these huge glass windows to let a lot of light in. They also have a lot of options; gluten free bun, vegan patties, a variety of toppings. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a  good quality burger for that late night burger craving. 5/5
